title: Lesbian Cow
author: Lesbian Cow
content: Hello Everyone!Up for raffle today I have the 2 x Satori Chips show in the photos below.  Post fork, best fork.Once all entries are paid I will choose a block.  The last character of that block will choose the winner.WINNER TAKE ALLTicket price:BTC: 0.001BTC payments only to this address: 12crpMogx32PhAGkpNab5cBTnTwksdGR6w  Shipping:  Worldwide shipping included - winner responsible for any local customs/duties.  Ships from East Coast US.Reservations:0123456789ABCDEF
